channel.title: Just a question about slayer
channel.description:
[PI]Base
Can there only be 5 slayer tasks per easy/med/hard & elite(=selfmaded) categorie?
I had 12 elite slayer tasks(=slayer.java) and i asked elite slayer tasks 25 times, but got only the first 5 tasks wich was in the slayer.java, ( I also edited the other file, wich need to be edited if you add slayer tasks, so can can excelly COMPLETE the tasks, else i should get -1 at my task amount.. so that file was also good). Now i have remove the first 5 tasks, and now i am getting the next 5 tasks.
So my question was.. Can there only be 5 tasks per categorie?

item.title: Just a question about slayer
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

if playerHasEliteTask == true) { //This is a made up Boolean, you'll have to implement it yourself. c.taskAmount = Misc.random(5) + 5; } else { c.taskAmount = Misc.random(15) + 15; } c.sendMessage("You have been assigned to kill " + c.taskAmount + " " + Server.npcHandler.getNpcListName(given) + " as a slayer task."); c.slayerTask = given;

Read full topic

item.title: Just a question about slayer
item.dc:creator: @MrSnow1 MrSnow1
item.description:
@MrSnow1 wrote:

[quote=“Null Amount, post:5, topic:528609”]Go where it handles giving out each specific tier and for elite tasks, add an if-statement so that instead of giving a random number between 0-15, it a gives a random number between 5-10. if playerHasEliteTask == true) { c.taskAmount = Misc.random(5) + 5; }[/quote]
c.slayerTask = given;
c.taskAmount = Misc.random(15) + 15;
c.sendMessage(“You have been assigned to kill " + c.taskAmount + " " + Server.npcHandler.getNpcListName(given) + " as a slayer task.”);

This is the only thing what i got what handles the amount of how much to kill,
How can i fit in what you said?

Read full topic

item.title: Just a question about slayer
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Go where it handles giving out each specific tier and for elite tasks, add an if-statement so that instead of giving a random number between 0-15, it a gives a random number between 5-10. if playerHasEliteTask == true) { c.taskAmount = Misc.random(5) + 5; }

Read full topic

item.title: Just a question about slayer
item.dc:creator: @MrSnow1 MrSnow1
item.description:
@MrSnow1 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:528609”][quote author=MrSnow1 link=topic=647363.msg4353741#msg4353741 date=1377117075]
[PI]Base

Can there only be 5 slayer tasks per easy/med/hard & elite(=selfmaded) categorie?

I had 12 elite slayer tasks(=slayer.java) and i asked elite slayer tasks 25 times, but got only the first 5 tasks wich was in the slayer.java, ( I also edited the other file, wich need to be edited if you add slayer tasks, so can can excelly COMPLETE the tasks, else i should get -1 at my task amount… so that file was also good).
Now i have remove the first 5 tasks, and now i am getting the next 5 tasks.

So my question was… Can there only be 5 tasks per categorie?
[/quote]
Make sure it isn’t looping or only checking the first 5…[/quote]
Is there an option for it? if so, in wich file will that be?

slayer? npchandler? player?

also the amount of the tasks, this is the only file wich can be edited for amounts, i tough
c.slayerTask = given;
c.taskAmount = Misc.random(15) + 15;
If its possible, i would like to change my elite tasks, to 5-10 kills,

I now get 15-30 of amounts to kill.

Read full topic

item.description:

Now i have remove the first 5 tasks, and now i am getting the next 5 tasks.

So my question was… Can there only be 5 tasks per categorie?[/quote]
Make sure it isn’t looping or only checking the first 5…
